price: Allah svjedoči da nema istinskog boga osim Njega, a i meleki i učeni, postupajući pravedno. Nema boga osim Njega, Silnog i Mudrog.
arabic: شَهِدَ ٱللَّهُ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ قَآئِمَۢا بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: shahida al-lahu annahu lā ilāha illā huwa wal-malāikatu wa-ulū al-ʿil'mi qāiman bil-qis'ṭi lā ilāha illā huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
